page.title: 08WEST END GARAGE,BUCHLYVIE
page.content: {THE WEST END GARAGE}is situated at the entrance to the village on the busy GLASGOW to STIRLING road. The structure is 30ft. by 48ft. fronted by petrol pumps and one diesel pump. The garage has tanks capable of storing {5000}gallons of petrol,{1000}gallons of diesel oil and{200}gallons of paraffin. The whole complex is incorporated in approximately 2/3 of an acre. The garage trade is mainly car repairs, servicing and M.O.T. work but some agricultural work is also undertaken. Being the only garage in the village, and one of the few in the district licensed and capable of carrying out M.O.T. work, it has a busy trade. The garage supplies a{TAXI {SERVICE}which conveys children from outlying areas to and from school. Car owners find that the garage gives an invaluable service within the village.
